DND5E.ADVANCEMENT.PotentDragonmark.Title: Potent Dragonmark
DND5E.ADVANCEMENT.PotentDragonmark.Hint: Set spells from your Spells of the Mark list to Always Prepared and allow them to be cast using an extra spell slot.

Warning.NoDragonmark: No Dragonmark feat found! The Potent Dragonmark feat cannot be taken unless character has an existing dragonmark.

ArtificerPlan.Hint: Select a {description} that this plan will create.

Warning.Cursed: Artificer plans cannot be created from cursed magic items.
Warning.Permissions: Must have an assigned character or permission to create items in the sidebar to create Artificer plans.
Warning.Physical: Artificer plans can only be created for physical items.
Warning.PotionScroll: Artificer plans cannot be created from common potions or scrolls.
Warning.Rarity: Artificer plans can only be created from magic items of common, uncommon, or rare rarity.
Warning.Wondrous: Artificer plans from uncommon or rare rarity can only be created from Wondrous items.
